name: .TAP File Extension
summary: Learn about .TAP files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Disk image created from a data storage tape formatted for the Commodore 64 (C64) or ZX Spectrum systems; contains an exact copy of the data from the tape in a single file; typically used for games or other types of applications.

content: TAP files may be opened on Windows computers using a C64 or ZX Spectrum emulator.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
